resources.string: If you got this app, it means you either downloaded it at random, or you\'re interested in the quality of my work.
Of all the gin joints,\nin all the towns,\nin all the world, you walk into mine.
This is yet another watchlist app, except this one is mine. I won\'t bore you with the details - we all know how favouriting items works and I\'m sure you\'ll figure it out.
Now, grab some popcorn and a tall glass of cool lemonade, relax, and forget the world for a while.
